attributes.action: Arrest Uri Geller for Psychic Vanadlism
attributes.additional_details:
On 22nd March 2019 Celebrity Psychic URI Geller wrote a letter to PM Theresa May, claiming that he would “stop [her] telepathically from [leading Britain into Brexit]”.

On 4th April 2019 a burst pipe flooded the Houses of Commons, causing untold damage and disturbance to the country’s ongoing political dealings.

Later that same day, Geller sent the following tweet: “Yes I did it @HouseOfCommons! I bent the pipes, and I won’t apologise, you all deserve it! #brexit #startfromscratch”
attributes.background: This man must be stopped. We cannot allow this kind of telepathic tomfoolery to get in the way of our strong and stable government at such a crucial time in the Brexit process.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because there is no crime of "Psychic Vandalism".

In any case, we can't accept petitions that accuse people of crimes or call for them to be arrested.
